casebody.data:
The CADLE COMPANY
v.
Frank F. OGALIN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017

Roy W. Moss, in support of the petition.

Paul N. Gilmore, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 1, 167 A.3d 402 (2017), is denied.
